text: My name is Tuan Nguyen,
and I am the Chief Information Officer
for Techcombank in Vietnam.

Techcombank is one of the
largest private bank in Vietnam.
So when we decided to move
the application to the cloud,

in general, our first
objective is speed to market,

and we achieved that based
on what we have done so far.
Before we would move to AWS,

we were on the very old
legacy kind of systems back then.

So when we decided to move
to AWS, we have to move all
of those systems into the cloud as well.

So the challenge here
is how are we able to

run these systems in the most
efficient way without any
interruption to the business,
when we are migrating them to the cloud?

Currently, we have the
Oracle fraud detection,
and also the AML running on AWS.
We also have OFSAA,

which is Oracle Financial
Services Analytical Application
running on AWS as well.
Within 18 months of signing the contract,
and, you know, partnering with AWS,

we were able to migrate 60%
of our workload onto AWS.
We saw significant gain from productivity,
as well as people are being,
getting more agile, nimble, self serving,

and more self-initiative
in term of what they need,

instead of waiting for
somebody to provide a tool,
or giving them something.

We also, you know, see very
clearly that in term of cost,
we were able to reduce some costs.
To some extent it could be up
to 20% if you are managing it correctly.

I have to be, you know, very
happy to say that, you know,

the uptime has been
significantly improved.

The AWS professional
services have been partnering
with us from day one,

and also help us to put in
the cloud business office,
and the process around it,

so that we can structurally
and methodically moving

and migrating the application
from on-prem to the cloud.

We trained over 6,000
employee in the bank on AWS

technologies and got over
600 people certified on it.
So they have been, you know, handholding,
and guiding us along the way.
At the same time, you know, become a coach

and the partner to, to teach
our team the new skills.
